Hello,

I found a conflict between the mod "contact configurator V1.20.3" and Infernal Robotics v2.0.6.

Indeed, contract configurator prevents infernal robotics of customized template icon in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> and <abbr title="SpacePlane Hangar">SPH</abbr> and in game.

> 
>

>

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/55420-120-toolbar-1713-common-api-for-draggableresizable-buttons-toolbar/&page=55#comment-2770188](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/55420-120-toolbar-1713-common-api-for-draggableresizable-buttons-toolbar/&page=55#comment-2770188)

> 
> 
> 
> 1. [IR mod from spacedock](http://spacedock.info/mod/657/Magic%20Smoke%20Industries%20Infernal%20Robotics/) made for 1.1.2. for parts or it is better to use [latest 2.0.5.](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases) full release from github
> 2. [IR sequencer](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-Sequencer) from github
> 3. [Model rework IR parts](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-ModelRework) from ZodiusInfuser
> 4. Latest [beta IR plugin](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/tag/2.0.6) as in link from above post
> 
> 
> 
> Please correct me if I'm missed something, could be useful too for others to know if they have proper latest part pack and plugin. Less false bug reports that way.
> 

Give this man a cookie, you sir, are the most valuable player.  

Although, I think there's a problem with the third link, the latest downloadable link I can find for Model Rework is this; [1.1.2](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9f5PHcywXQINzQ3UC1aLVNBZk0/view)

Also, dear Ziw, why are there so many things to download? Is it illegal to combine all of this in one file?

[@Ziw](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/135292-ziw/) : 

After some research, it seems that the models that use the game tool bar should update any function code.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/150719-contract-configurator-broke-my-mod/&do=findComment&comment=2826102](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/150719-contract-configurator-broke-my-mod/&do=findComment&comment=2826102)

> Also, dear Ziw, why are there so many things to download? Is it illegal to combine all of this in one file?

Model Rework part is done by [@ZodiusInfuser](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/76163-zodiusinfuser/) and he wanted to keep it separate. Our legacy parts are not up to standards now, and with a lot of people using reworked parts we decided to keep them as a separate download to reduce ZIP file size. Also the parts themselves do not change over different versions, so they are more of a dead-weight if you just want to release a quick update like this beta.

When the full version is ready, we usually create a version of a download file with parts included.

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, Ziw said:
> 
> 
> Model Rework part is done by [@ZodiusInfuser](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/76163-zodiusinfuser/) and he wanted to keep it separate. Our legacy parts are not up to standards now, and with a lot of people using reworked parts we decided to keep them as a separate download to reduce ZIP file size. Also the parts themselves do not change over different versions, so they are more of a dead-weight if you just want to release a quick update like this beta.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> When the full version is ready, we usually create a version of a download file with parts included.
> 

Thank you so much for the explanation. Such a shame when somebody creates versions of a main mod but then want to keep it separate. It's not like you don't give any proper credit to the others, cause you do, which I respect.

> 

I think you misunderstood, he does not create a version of a mod, he creates additional parts, that use the mod, which is great, because I cannot do parts. And his parts are very thought through and cool. He also helps A LOT with maintaining main mod as well so only utmost respect for him from me.

# 
[CC and Toolbar changes + some minor bugfixing](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/tag/2.0.7)

![@ZiwKerman](https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/11242352?v=3&s=40) [ZiwKerman](https://github.com/ZiwKerman) released this 3 minutes ago

# 
Requires Clean-ish Install

## 
Leave the Parts subfolder, but please delete the MagicSmokeIndustries/AssetBundles subfolder before installing.

**NO PARTS IN THE ZIP FILE, KEEP YOUR CURRENT PARTS**

Download here: [https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/tag/2.0.7](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/tag/2.0.7)

Thanks a lot for the quick support and for maintaining this.

Can confirm the bug [@Drakenex](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/114246-drakenex/) is experiencing. Everything is offset and weird and not working properly. Removing KJR fixed it.
